welcome_message_body: Welcome to Huehuetoca, where the charm of traditional Mexican culture meets modern convenience. Explore the city's rich history, vibrant markets, and beautiful scenery, and enjoy all that Huehuetoca has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, dedicated to serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
